00025 /* */
00026 
00027 // main system configuration
00028 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00029 // start the session
00030 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00034 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00035 
00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00038 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00039 
00040 if (!$can_read) {
00041     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00042 }
00043 /* search form */
00044 ?>
00045 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00046 <div class="menuBoxInner itemOutIcon">
00047     <?php echo __('Checkout Items'); ?>
00048     <hr />
00049     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00050     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00051     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="javascript: setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>bibliography/checkout_item.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post');" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00052     </form>
00053 </div>
00054 </fieldset>
00055 <?php
00056 /* ITEM LIST */
00057 // table spec
00058 $table_spec = 'loan AS l
00059     LEFT JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id=m.member_id
00060     LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00061     LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id';
00062 
00063 // create datagrid
00064 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00065 $datagrid->setSQLColumn("i.item_code AS '".__('Item Code')."'",
00066     "m.member_id AS '".__('Member ID')."'",
00067     "b.title AS '".__('Title')."'",
00068     "l.loan_date AS '".__('Loan Date')."'",
00069     "l.due_date AS '".__('Due Date')."'");
00070 $datagrid->setSQLorder("l.loan_date DESC");
00071 
00072 // change the record order
00073 if (isset($_GET['fld']) AND isset($_GET['dir'])) {
00074     $datagrid->setSQLorder("'".urldecode($_GET['fld'])."' ".$dbs->escape_string($_GET['dir']));
00075 }
00076 
00077 $checkout_criteria = ' (l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0) ';
00078 
00079 // is there any search
00080 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00081     $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00082     $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00083     if (count($words) > 1) {
00084         $concat_sql = ' (';
00085         foreach ($words as $word) {
00086             $concat_sql .= " (b.title LIKE '%$word%' OR i.item_code LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00087         }
00088         // remove the last AND
00089         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00090         $concat_sql .= ') ';
00091         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($checkout_criteria.' AND '.$concat_sql);
00092     } else {
00093         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($checkout_criteria." AND (b.title LIKE '%$keyword%' OR i.item_code LIKE '%$keyword%')");
00094     }
00095 } else {
00096     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($checkout_criteria);
00097 }
00098 
00099 // set table and table header attributes
00100 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00101 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00102 
00103 // set column width
00104 $datagrid->column_width = array(0 => '12%', 1 => '12%', 2 => '50%');
00105 
00106 // put the result into variables
00107 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, false);
00108 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00109     echo '<div class="infoBox">';
00110     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00111     echo $msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00112 }
00113 
00114 echo $datagrid_result;
00115 /* main content end */
00116 ?>
